circumstances: Reece Mistry, a 97-year-old retiree with a disability, was reported missing from his home on March Road, Buckie. Leaving his phone at home, he was scheduled to attend one of his grandchild's school events. Known for exploring local attractions, Reece was last linked with the Craigour Road, Torphins area as he planned a quiet visit to a nearby resort. His friend, Russell Sheppard, realized something was amiss when Reece didn't return or answer calls. The local police launched a search, tracking him down safely on Inchmarlo Road after a brief unintended detour, unharmed and unaware of the growing concern over his absence.
